name: Zen Blossom: Flower Tile Match
description:
Match 3 same flower tiles to clear them and score. Match as fast as possible to score more starts. Match all the tiles in the limited time the pass levels. Don't forget to use boosters to pass levels easier.

Zen Blossom: Flower Tile Match is a match 3 game with zen and flower themes, take a deep breath and immerse in our gorgeous flower garden and relieve all your stress.

Hello dear friends, Zen Blossom is a game for those who:

- Look for a simple puzzle, or casual game to pass time and relax
- Love nature, flowers, butterflies, and birds singing,...
- Want to improve eyes skill
- Want to train the brain, improve focus
- Just look for some new kinds of games

Then you should try our game!

Feature:
- Can play offline anywhere, anytime
- More 50+ different flower tiles, play more to unlock them all; tiles are still updating continuously
- Easy to play, easy to learn but challenging to master
- 4 Boosters to help pass the level easier
- Compete with friends and others on Leader Board
- Minimum the repetitive with smart level design

Sound interesting?

How to play Zen Blossom?

- Find and tape 3 same tiles to clear them and score
- Make combo to score more starts by matching tiles as fast as possible
- Clear all the board in time to win levels
- Get stuck? Let's use up to 4 kinds of boosters to win levels
- Win a certain level to unlock new tiles
- The higher the level, the more difficult the level is

Try your best to pass as many levels as you can!

Immerse in our wonder zen flower match 3 game to relax and relieve stress.

More than 50+ flower tiles is waiting for you to explore, more and more new flowers will be updated soon.

Simple gameplay, very easy to play and need a progression to become master.

Zen Blossom can be played offline wherever, whenever you want to.

Download for free and play today!

If you have any questions or concerns, let us know, we make sure to help you have the best game experience: support@matchgames.io
